content.description: Start on the low, large pocket to the right side of the starting face of Trust This. From there, bump to a decent crimp, adjust your feet, bump to the start jug of Trust This, and then top out as you would for Trust This.
content.location: Start in the same location as Trust This.

content.description: Start from a stand start with a match on the large jug with your right foot on a low chip. Then traverse left to the arete and move your left hand from the jug to the arete sidepull. Then move your right hand from jug to high gaston on the arete. Then dynamically pull off the two arete holds, and reach for a good sidepull around the corner (an obvious, cleaned hold) from there, move your hands up to obvious holds, and top out.
content.location: Take the lightly beaten trail heading down to the pond from Balance Rock Cliff, and then go right. The problem is about 50 feet from the house on the property.

content.description: Sit start on the crack with a foot cam and your hands on a crack. Bump your hands once or twice, throw for lip with your left hand, and top out.
content.location: It is about 20 feet to the right of Trust This.

content.description: Start by matching in the large, undercling jug, and then move your hands off to the obvious holds on your left side. It has not very difficult holds. It is more of a strange, balancy problem. Getting the right feet and body positioning is the "crux". This has been cleaned minimally but could use a good scrub.
content.location: If you stand with the main face of Balance Rock cliff directly behind you, walk down the lightly beaten trail about 200 feet. The problem will be on your left.

content.description: this area includes balance rock main cliff, and small surrounding problems in between the cliff and the House on the hill
